body.p:
Louisville Ky May 15th ^1861^
Joshua Tevis Esqr.
Frankfort
Ky
I have looked to the proceedings of the legislature to see if you had acted in that matter of mine. If you have not -- please do not forget it.

Also appoint
N. Wolfe &
J. Tevis
